wizards.name: Gandalf
quotes: A wizard is never late, nor is he early, he arrives precisely when he means to.
All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us.

tools.name: Glamdring
tools.description: A sword that glows blue in the presence of Orcs, originally owned by Turgon, the Elven King of Gondolin.

tools.name: Staff of Gandalf
tools.description: A powerful staff used by Gandalf to perform magic and as a walking aid.

wizards.background_story: Gandalf is one of the five Istari sent by the Valar to aid the peoples of Middle-earth in their struggle against Sauron. Known for his wisdom, courage, and leadership, he played a key role in the events of the Third Age.

appearance.description: Gandalf appears as an old man with a long beard and hair, often wearing a gray robe and a tall hat. He carries a staff and wields the sword Glamdring.

wizards.name: Saruman
wizards.affiliation: Order of the Istari, initially a member of the White Council
quotes: I am Saruman the Wise, Saruman Ring-maker, Saruman of Many Colours.
There is only one Lord of the Ring, and he does not share power.

tools.name: Staff of Saruman
tools.description: A staff used by Saruman, symbolizing his authority and power as a wizard.

tools.name: Palant√≠r of Orthanc
tools.description: A seeing-stone used by Saruman to communicate with Sauron and gain knowledge.

wizards.background_story: Saruman was once the chief of the Istari and the leader of the White Council. However, he fell to corruption and sought the One Ring for himself, becoming a major antagonist in the War of the Ring.

appearance.description: Saruman is depicted as a tall, imposing figure with a white robe and a long beard. He carries a staff and has a commanding presence.

wizards.name: Radagast
quotes: I am Radagast the Brown, a servant of the Valar.
The world is indeed full of peril, and in it there are many dark places.

tools.name: Staff of Radagast
tools.description: A staff used by Radagast, aiding him in his magic and connection with nature.

tools.name: Radagast's Robes
tools.description: Robes worn by Radagast, reflecting his connection to nature and the wild.

wizards.background_story: Radagast is one of the Istari who is known for his affinity with nature and animals. Although less involved in the central conflicts of Middle-earth, he plays a role in aiding the Free Peoples through his knowledge of the natural world.

appearance.description: Radagast is depicted as an older man with brown robes and a wild appearance. His connection to nature is evident in his attire and demeanor.

wizards.name: Alatar
quotes: Little is known of Alatar in the tales, as he traveled into the East and his deeds remain largely unknown.

tools.name: Staff of Alatar
tools.description: A staff used by Alatar, symbolizing his role as one of the Istari.

wizards.background_story: Alatar is one of the two Blue Wizards sent to Middle-earth by the Valar. His fate and deeds are largely unknown, as he traveled into the East and was not involved in the main events of the Third Age.

appearance.description: Alatar's appearance is largely undocumented, but he is known to have worn blue robes and carried a staff.

wizards.name: Pallando
quotes: Little is known of Pallando in the tales, as he traveled into the East and his deeds remain largely unknown.

tools.name: Staff of Pallando
tools.description: A staff used by Pallando, symbolizing his role as one of the Istari.

wizards.background_story: Pallando is the other Blue Wizard sent to Middle-earth alongside Alatar. Like Alatar, his actions and fate are shrouded in mystery, with little known about his impact on Middle-earth.

appearance.description: Pallando's appearance is also largely unknown, but he is believed to have worn blue robes and carried a staff similar to Alatar's.
